metadata.title: CVE-2022-44032 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.6.drivers/char/pcmcia/cm4000_cs.c has a race condition and resultantuse-after-free if a physically proximate attacker removes a PCMCIA devicewhile calling open(), aka a race condition between cmm_open() andcm4000_detach().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
